item.description:
This event is sponsored by the New Hampshire Liberty Alliance.

WHAT: Election ACTIVISM
WHEN: Tuesday, June 17th 7:45 PM
WHERE: Murphy's Taproom [ Map ]
WHY: CRITICAL ELECTION ALERT!!!

The November 2008 elections are critical. And the campaigns start NOW. All who wish to see Liberty grow in New Hampshire can help get pro-liberty candidates elected. The NHLA is sponsoring a series of hands-on workshops to get candidates connected with activists, and to show new activists what they need to do to get their true representatives elected!

This first session is conveniently co-scheduled with Taproom Tuesday and will be led by Rep. Dan Itse. Come to learn, then hit the streets and campaign!
item.name: Election Activist Activation
